attributes.action: Give hard working British families a home first.
attributes.background: 100,000 British people in the British Isles are being housed in temporary accommodation, on the understanding that no homes are available, whilst we continue to see a rise in immigration into this country, and the additional arrival of 20000 Syrians.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think these petitions are similar to yours:  

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107787
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107542

You might like to sign one of these petitions instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
